entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
